Texts.Chs: 把^orange;钢铁短剑^reset;带给^green;科学家^reset;(位于^orange;科学前哨站^reset;)
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;steel warblade^reset; to the scientist at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 很棒，我喜欢切砍东西。给，这是你的报酬。
Texts.Eng: Excellent, enjoy cutting stuff up. Here, take this off my hands.

Texts.Chs: 直说了吧，我的剑太烂了。给我一把新的。去你的^orange;军械车间^reset;制作一柄^orange;钢铁短剑^reset;！你需要先升级你的^orange;军备作坊^reset;。
Texts.Eng: I'll be blunt. My sword sucks. Make me a new one. Go craft a ^orange;Steel Warblade^reset; in your ^orange;Assembly Line^reset;! You'll need to upgrade your ^orange;Armorworks^reset; first.
